channel.title: Running Whonix-Gateway XFCE as CLI
channel.description: Is there a solution to force VM (Whonix-Gateway XFCE) to run as CLI without lowering RAM to 256MB? I would like to add more RAM to VM but it automaticly run with GUI. I know that already is Whonix-Gateway CLI but I would like to be able to switch between GUI and CLI without crippling the RAM.

item.title: Running Whonix-Gateway XFCE as CLI
item.dc:creator: Harlem
item.description:
Thanx, that should do the trick. I will test it.

Read full topic

item.title: Running Whonix-Gateway XFCE as CLI
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Possible.

Whonix â€“ 26 Dec 20

RAM Adjusted Desktop Starter

rads - Starts [no] desktop environment based on available RAM. Automatically boots into graphical desktop environment, when there is enough RAM. Or into terminal-only, when there is too little RAM. Useful inside virtual machines.
